headline: Profusa Welcomes Former Acting U.S. Veterans Affairs Secretary  Peter O’Rourke as Lead Independent Director; Adds Seasoned  Finance Executive Fred Knechtel as CFO
summary: Board addition served in the Trump Administration, overseeing 1,300 facilities serving more than 9 million veterans; New CFO has led finance and operations at companies including Northrop Grumman, Stanley Black & Decker, and DuPont Berkeley, Calif, Aug. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Profusa, Inc.
